ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coconut flavored rum
des: "Coconut rum and pineapple juice floating with 151 rum - a great shooter for parties!"
ins: In a cocktail mixer full of ice, combine coconut rum and pineapple juice. Shake vigorously and strain into glass. Float 151 rum over the top. Drink in one gulp.
